translations: v.奉承，谄媚（toady 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 拍马屁文化, 奉承文化

sentences.sentence: They came backstage afterward, cooing and toadying to him.
sentences.translation: 然后他们来到后台，对他柔声细语，拍他的马屁。

sentences.sentence: He is always toadying to the boss.
Although he needs money badly, he says that toadying to his rich brother is the very last thing he would do.
sentences.translation: 他说，虽然急需钱，他也决不会去巴结他那有钱的兄弟。
